meanings.definition: A record of the customs or duties of a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The custumal detailed the taxes owed by each villager.
meanings.sent2: The custumal was consulted to determine the appropriate tariffs.
meanings.sent3: The custumal seemed to have a mind of its own, always revealing unexpected fees.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of receipts was a custumal of her spending habits.
meanings.sent5: The custumal book was filled with colorful illustrations of trade practices.

meanings.sent1: Following the custumal of the land, they celebrated harvest festivals.
meanings.sent2: The custumal dictated the proper way to address elders.
meanings.sent3: The custumal of wearing mismatched socks on Fridays brought laughter to the office.
meanings.sent4: His morning routine had become a custumal, a ritual he couldn't break.
meanings.sent5: The custumal of exchanging gifts during the holidays created a sense of community.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of customs or traditions.
meanings.sent1: The custumal attire for the ceremony was elegant and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She followed the custumal recipe passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The custumal dance was a joyful expression of their heritage.
meanings.sent4: His custumal behavior at family gatherings always brought smiles.
meanings.sent5: The custumal decorations transformed the room into a festive space.
